cab.content: (This Document is the Property otHis Britannic Majesty's Government)19 * 31BATTLE SITUATION - 1T00N - 6th MAY, 1918.1. The Australians carried out a minor operation last night south west of MORLAwCOURT, advancing their line on a front of 2,000 yards, and capturing over 150 prisoners.2. We improved our positions in the neighbourhood of LOCOii.5, On the rest of the front there is nothing to report, and no attacks have developed so far this morning.General Staff,War Office, S.Y;*1. May 6 th 1918.Issued at 1 p.m.
